Getting started¶

Ask for an API Key¶

Log in, go to menu “Keys” and click on “Create a new key”, fill all the informations, then click on “create”. Your key is generated immediately !

Use our tools¶

  • [client-side] Play.js is the easiest way to generate videos. Learn more.
  • [server-side] It includes php, python, ruby and java clients for the API. Learn more.

Start hacking !¶

The developer kit contains an example that you can try. Then, we suggest you to read Video description language to understood how the XML should be build.

Give us your feedback¶

Because making a great service is in our DNA, and because we love our customers. We’ll be glad to heard from you ! Send us a message.
